entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 30 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
